app_descript:
Alphabet

Brief: Step into the labyrinthine universe of Alphabet, a captivating game where you navigate through a maze filled with rooms and challenges. Utilize clever strategies to overpower various monsters and unravel the full Alphabet Story. Will your tactical prowess ensure your survival and victory over the final boss?
